content:
The 47th brigade reflected the Russians' meat storm with FPV. The result of the work of drops - 21 destroyed and 16 wounded invaders.

The MSC burned 10 units of enemy equipment, in particular: Pion and Carnation SAU, two 122 mm howitzers D-30, APC and five cars.

In the Kreminna area, the Russians tried to pick up a lined Ukrainian leopard tank, but instead lost two armored cars.

The Belgium Ministry of Defense showed staff from the exercises of our military at F-16 fighters in Denmark.

The SBU detained the informant of the Russian intelligence, who was spying for the Armed Forces in the Nikolaev area, and the border guards detained the evil, who tried to escape to Moldova.

These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Senior Lieutenant Artem Golub and Lieutenant Colonel Sergei Misyura.
title: The drones reflected the meat storm, the inclusion from under Bakhmut and Zaporozhye: Strang from the frontier city
description: The MSC burned 10 units of enemy equipment, in particular: Pion and Carnation SAU, ...
author: Army Inform
